scripts.start: concurrently  "php artisan config:cache" "php artisan serve" "npm run dev"
scripts.clear: composer dump && php artisan config:clear && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan route:clear
scripts.migrate: php artisan config:clear && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan migrate
scripts.reseed: php artisan config:clear && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan migrate:fresh && php artisan db:seed
